ingredients: ['1.3kg beef bones', '3 whole cloves', '3 whole star anise pods', '1 (1cm) piece cinnamon stick', '1 teaspoon olive oil', '1 large onion, chopped', '1 (6cm) piece ginger, peeled', '225g braising steak', '2 tablespoons fish sauce', '1 tablespoon raw sugar', '2 teaspoons coarse sea salt, or to taste', '2.25L water', '225g topside beef', '325g dry rice noodles', '1 tablespoon freshly chopped coriander', '2 spring onions, chopped']
